long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the world of German entertainment with this extension. Whether you’re learning German, an expat in Germany, or simply want to enjoy German public broadcasting in your preferred language, this tool seamlessly translates German media subtitles into the language of your choice. Enhance your viewing experience and make German TV shows, movies, and news more accessible with real-time subtitle translation. Perfect for foreigners in Germany looking to bridge the language gap and enjoy German content in English, Spanish, French, and more.
